original_text: The land enjoyed its sabbath rests; all the time of its desolation it rested, until the seventy years were completed in fulfillment of the word of the Lord spoken by Jeremiah.
korean_text: 이에 토지가 황폐하여 땅이 안식년을 누림 같이 안식하여 칠십 년을 지냈으니 여호와께서 예레미야의 입으로 하신 말씀이 이루어졌더라

sentences.original_text: The land enjoyed its sabbath rests
all the time of its desolation it rested
until the seventy years were completed
in fulfillment of the word of the Lord
